stripe.confirmReactivate: Do you want to reactivate your subscription? It will renew automatically at the end of the period.

emails.title: Billing Emails
emails.subtitle: Global email template management for billing events
emails.globalConfigDesc: This configuration applies to all billing emails (logo, sender, footer).
emails.logoUrlDesc: Logo that will appear in the billing email header
emails.footerTextDesc: Text that will appear in the footer of all emails
emails.templatesDesc: Edit email templates for billing events. You can use dynamic tokens.
emails.welcomeDesc: Email sent when a client activates their subscription
emails.planChangeDesc: Email sent when a client changes their plan
emails.cancellationDesc: Email sent when a client cancels their subscription
emails.htmlBodyDesc: Write HTML and use tokens like {{clientName}}, {{planName}}, etc.
emails.infoItem1: Emails will only be sent if the corresponding template is active
emails.infoItem2: Tokens are automatically replaced when sending the email
emails.infoItem3: You can use HTML to format content (bold, lists, etc.)
emails.infoItem4: The logo and footer will be automatically applied from the global configuration

itinerarios.notesPlaceholder: Special preferences, dietary restrictions, specific dates...
itinerarios.confirmDeleteItinerary: Delete this itinerary? This action cannot be undone.

chatbot.title: Chatbot Configuration
chatbot.subtitle: Set up the virtual assistant for your end customers
chatbot.agencyInfoPlaceholder: Describe your agency, main services, schedules...
chatbot.destinationsAutoLoaded: These destinations are automatically loaded from your panel
chatbot.noFaqs: No FAQs configured. Add frequently asked questions to improve bot responses.
chatbot.faqSuggestion1a: We are open Monday to Friday 9:00-19:00 and Saturdays 10:00-14:00.
chatbot.faqSuggestion2q: How can I make a booking?
chatbot.faqSuggestion2a: You can book directly from our website by selecting your destination and dates.
chatbot.faqSuggestion3q: What payment methods do you accept?
chatbot.faqSuggestion3a: We accept credit/debit cards (Visa, Mastercard) through Stripe, our secure payment platform.
chatbot.faqSuggestion4a: Free cancellation is available up to 48h before departure. Check the specific conditions for each destination.
chatbot.faqSuggestion5a: We recommend purchasing travel insurance. We can advise you on the best options for your destination.
chatbot.faqSuggestion6q: How can I contact the agency?
chatbot.faqSuggestion6a: You can reach us by email, phone or through the contact form on our website.

assistant.title: AI Assistant
assistant.subtitle: Ask anything you need about your agency
assistant.emptySubtitle: Ask me about destinations, marketing, content, strategy or anything related to your agency.
assistant.suggestion1: What destinations should I add for summer?
assistant.suggestion2: Write me an Instagram post about Maldives
assistant.suggestion3: How can I improve my conversion rate?
assistant.suggestion4: Generate a budget for 4 people to Thailand
assistant.suggestion5: Help me create a summer newsletter post
assistant.suggestion6: How should I respond to an unhappy customer?
assistant.errorGeneric: Error processing your message. Please try again.
